Development¶

Release Info¶

Current version 0.1.0 supports TXT conversions of USPTO bulk patent data (Full Text - no images) to csv and dataframe format. This includes patent data from January of 1976 to December of 2001. Support for XML1 and XML2 is anticipated in next release.

Contribute¶

To contribute to patentpy, you can create issues for any bugs/suggestions on the issues page. You can also fork the patentpy repository and create pull requests to add features you think will be useful for users.

Citation¶

Yu J, Wadhwa RR, Erdi P. patentpy: Access USPTO Bulk Data in Rectangular Format. 2021; Python package version 0.1.0. URL https://github.com/JYProjs/patentpy.
